long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine if Netflix had a comment section...

Now, it does! Introducing Netflix Comments, an open-source browser extension inspired by Crunchy Comments that brings a fully functional comment section to Netflix. Whether you're watching a gripping drama, bingeing the latest series, or revisiting classic movies, now you can share your thoughts and engage with others directly on Netflix!

Netflix Comments allows you to interact with fellow viewers in real time, enhancing your viewing experience by fostering a community conversation on every show and movie you love.

Key Features:
- Real-time Discussions: Engage in live conversations as you watch, or leave comments to discuss after the credits roll.
- Anonymous or Social Login: Choose to comment anonymously or log in via GitHub, Twitter/X, or just plain old Email.
- Nested Conversations: Threaded comments make it easy to follow discussions and reply directly to others.
- Privacy by Design: No tracking or ads. Your comments stay private and secure, thanks to the Comentario engine powering the extension.
- Easy Moderation: Control comment threads with flexible moderation settings to keep the conversation respectful.
